Roy,

Apologies for picking just one fragment from your reply, but It seems  
to me that the question is whether the way this

On 09.06.2009, at 17:11, Roy T. Fielding wrote:

> a TM-style
> manager resource that tells all of the other services to commit
> the associated changes to a more persistent or public set of
> resources

is done is worth being standardized.

Stefan
--
Stefan Tilkov, http://www.innoq.com/blog/st/
--Apple-Mail-16--30588600
